participant_1.background:
I love seafood because I fish for it myself.
I went camping with my family at a lake and we all had a great time swimming, hiking and roasting marshmallows over the campfire.
I dress for my audience.
I used to lie to my parents, but now I am more honest with them.
I'm a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting.

participant_2.background:
I like to visit websites that have information about my allergies and trophies.
I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes.
i have made over 90 , 000 on trifecta bets alone this year.
My heart breaks when my grandchildren are sad.
i am lazy and pork tastes good.

content.text: Not much just trying to find out what to do for the weekend
Oh, have you thought about going camping?
That sounds like a fun idea! I haven't gone camping in a while
Me either! It's been a few years. It would be fun to go fishing
I love fishing! We could catch some dinner
That sounds great! I'll bring the beer
Sounds like a plan! I'll bring the food
Ok, we'll make a weekend of it
Great! I'll start looking for a campsite
